sqlMap.select: SELECT user_id as userId, user_name AS userNm, user_password AS userPw, xt.team_id as userTeamId, xt.team_name as userTeam, user_flag as userFlag, xd.dbms_id as userDbmsId, xd.dbms_name as userDbms, user_level as userLevel, xdt.department_id as userDeptId, xdt.department_name as userDept, xp.position_Id as userPosiId, xp.position_name as userPosi, user_phone as userPhone, user_mail as userMail, user_hint as userHint, coalesce(user_point, 0) as userPoint FROM XM_MEMBER xm left outer join xm_team xt on xt.team_id = xm.user_team_id left outer join xm_dbms xd on xd.dbms_id = xm.user_dbms_id left outer join xm_department xdt on xdt.department_id = xt.department_id left outer join xm_position xp on xp.position_id = xm.user_position_id where xm.user_id=#userId#

SELECT B.user_DBMS_ID AS dbmsId, A.DBMS_NAME AS dbmsNm, xt.DEPARTMENT_ID AS deptId FROM XM_MEMBER B left outer join XM_DBMS A on A.dbms_id=B.user_dbms_id left outer join xm_team xt on B.user_team_id = xt.team_id left outer join xm_department xdp on xt.department_id = xdp.department_id WHERE B.user_id = #userId#
SELECT POSITION_ID AS posiId, POSITION_NAME AS posiNm FROM XM_POSITION
sqlMap.update: UPDATE XM_MEMBER SET USER_DBMS_id = #userDbms#, USER_POSITION_id = #userPosi#, USER_PHONE = #userPhone#, USER_MAIL = #userMail# WHERE USER_ID = #userId#
UPDATE XM_MEMBER SET USER_PASSWORD = #userNewPw# WHERE USER_ID = #userId#
